article.headline: Marist 68, Canisius 62
article.story: ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) -- Will Whittington scored 14 of his 17 points in the second half, securing Marist's 68-62 victory over Canisius in the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference tournament quarterfinals Saturday. Jared Jordan scored 14 and Ryan Stilphen had 12 rebounds for the Red Foxes (19-9), who advanced to the semifinals for the first time since 2001 and only the third time since joining the MAAC in 1997. Marist, the 10-team tournament's third seed, will face second-seeded Iona on Sunday. Kevin Downey scored 16 and Chuck Harris and Darnell Wilson had 10 rebounds each for Canisius (9-20), which finished 24-of-61 from the field -- including Wilson muffing a dunk. The Golden Griffins erased an 11-point second-half deficit to cut Marist's lead to 62-58 on Joe Young's putback with 58 seconds remaining. Whittington hit two free throws and the Golden Griffins failed to respond, missing three shots -- including two Jon Popofski 3-point attempts -- on their next possession. Many had projected Canisius to contend for the conference title. Instead, the Golden Griffins' nine wins are their fewest since going 8-22 in 1991-92, raising questions about coach Mike MacDonald's status. Canisius is 108-153 during MacDonald's nine-year tenure, a stretch in which the program has enjoyed only two winning seasons and four 20-loss campaigns.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
